title: Generative AI Developer
description:
Role Overview: We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Generative AI Developer to join our innovative AI team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, fine-tuning, and deploying cutting-edge generative models (LLMs, diffusion models, etc.) to power new product features and internal capabilities. You will work closely with data scientists, machine learning engineers, and product managers to push the boundaries of AI.
Responsibilities:
Research, design, and implement state-of-the-art generative models based on project requirements.
Fine-tune pre-trained large language models (LLMs) on custom datasets for specific tasks (e.g., text summarization, question answering, code generation).
Develop and optimize prompts for effective interaction with generative models (Prompt Engineering).
Process and prepare large datasets for model training and fine-tuning.
Work with MLOps engineers to deploy, monitor, and maintain models in production environments (AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, or Azure ML).
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Generative AI, NLP, and deep learning.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI models into applications.
Evaluate model performance, conduct error analysis, and iterate on model improvements.
Required Qualifications:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, AI, Machine Learning, or a related quantitative field.
Proven experience in developing and implementing machine learning models, particularly deep learning models.
Strong programming skills in Python.
Hands-on experience with deep learning frameworks such as PyTorch or TensorFlow.
Experience with NLP techniques and libraries (e.g., Hugging Face Transformers, spaCy, NLTK).
Familiarity with core concepts of Large Language Models (LLMs) and transformer architectures.
Experience with data preprocessing and feature engineering.
Understanding of model evaluation metrics and techniques.
Experience with version control systems like Git.
Preferred Qualifications:
PhD in a relevant field.
Experience with specific LLM frameworks like LangChain or LlamaIndex.
Experience deploying models on cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure).
Experience with vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, ChromaDB, Weaviate).
Experience with MLOps tools and practices.
Contributions to open-source AI/ML projects or publications in relevant conferences.

title: Frontend developer
description:
Role Overview: We are looking for a passionate Frontend Developer to build intuitive, high-performance, and visually appealing user interfaces for our web applications. You will collaborate closely with UI/UX designers, backend developers, and product managers to translate requirements and designs into functional, responsive, and accessible web experiences using modern frontend technologies, primarily React.
Responsibilities:
Develop new user-facing features using React.js and potentially Material UI (MUI).
Build reusable components and frontend libraries for future use.
Translate UI/UX designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
Integrate with backend services via RESTful APIs.
Write clean, maintainable, and testable code (using tools like Jest, React Testing Library).
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Collaborate with team members and stakeholders using Agile methodologies.
Stay updated on emerging frontend technologies and best practices.
Ensure application adherence to accessibility standards (WCAG).
Required Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
Proven experience as a Frontend Developer building web applications.
Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3.
In-depth experience with React.js and its core principles (Components, State, Props, Hooks).
Experience with popular React state management libraries (e.g., Redux Toolkit, Zustand, Context API).
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
Experience with common frontend development tools such as Vite, Webpack, npm/yarn, and Git.
Understanding of responsive design principles and cross-browser compatibility issues.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with TypeScript.
Experience with UI component libraries, especially Material UI (MUI).
Experience with frontend testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress).
Familiarity with server-side rendering (SSR) or static site generation (SSG).
Understanding of web performance optimization techniques.
Basic understanding of backend development concepts.
Experience with Agile/Scrum development processes.
